name: Button Battle
description:
This is a light switch battle where you need to keep the countdown from reaching 0.

An AI will randomly try to press a button to start the timer, you try and last as long as you can by stopping the clock as soon as you can.

This project was made in a single night as an effort to try and make a microgame I could upload to my new website.

There's also an  in browser version: http://overworldstudio.com/button-battle/
Tried adding a high score table, not working perfectly yet.
